		window.CDN = "http://bf0982ad6cf1e32ac2bd-590fac75f7707ea7c8032b1b193445ca.r46.cf1.rackcdn.com/";
		if (navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('firefox') > -1) { window.CDN = "/"; }
		if ((/iPhone|iPod|Android|BlackBerry|Opera Mini|IEMobile/).test( navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera )) {
			document.write('<script src="/scripts/mobile.js"><\/script>');
		} else {
			document.write('<script src="/scripts/desktop.js"><\/script>');
		}
		</script>
		
		

		<script type="text/javascript">
		var _gaq = _gaq || [];
		_gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-11251639-12']);
		_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
		(function() {
			var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
			ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
			var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
		})();
